Sx06 Luxe was founded by Abdulmuqeet in October 2025. The '06' represents the founder's day - a symbol of legacy and personal significance. We combine timeless sophistication with sustainable craft. Learn more on our About page.
Our brand represents the intersection of luxury, sustainability, and innovation. Founded by Abdulmuqeet, the '06' honors a special day that represents legacy and vision. Discover our full story here.
Sx06 Luxe = S (Sustain) X (times) 06 (founder's day). We're redefining luxury through sustainability, sophistication, and innovative design. Read our full story.
